column1: Little Goat Diner////Ignore any star rating less than 5. This place is great. Awesome breakfast
column2: fabulous coffee and their lunch items are amazing. Yes
column4: but that happens. There is first come first serve at the bar in the back and there always seems to be a seat there. They do have inventive dishes
column5: so don't come in with your own expectations of someone else's creative spin on the flavor. Come in with an open mind and an empty stomach
